short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically changes letters to send through LetterBot on Dream-singles.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS EXTENSION IS NO LONGER MAINTAINED
Please check DreamAuto if you need new features and a fully supported extension

With this extension for dream-singles.com you will be able to send messages and photos on dream-singles.com without effort and time. Just paste the text, run the script and watch the bot do everything for you. A dating bot is a convenient, fast and reliable way to find your other half!

After putting your messages, you need to click on the extension icon and select "Start". The extension will start sending messages you put in fields and random photos from "All" category on the site. It will do the following steps for each message:
It will insert the message into the text box and add the name of the recipient at the beginning.
It will wait for the page to be loaded and then randomly select a photo from the "All" category of the Dream Singles site's gallery and send it along with the message.
After this extension will save the message with a picture.
The extension will repeat these steps until it runs out of messages or you stop it manually. You can stop the extension by clicking on the icon and choosing “Stop”. The extension will clear its your saved messages and stop sending.



Version: 3.0.0
Major Update.
— Added option to send boomerangs
— Small changes in the interface. In order to add fields you should click with the left mouse button on the "+" button. To remove fields you should click it with the right button
